updates.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy, expanding its AI capabilities with plans to integrate under the Figma Weave brand alongside the rest of the platform.
Perplexity launches AI-powered patent research tool to simplify searching through complex patent databases and strikes multi-year licensing deal with Getty Images to legitimize stock photo usage.
Y Combinator alum Adam raises $4.1M seed round to transform its viral text-to-3D model app into an AI copilot after generating over 10 million social media impressions.
Apple CEO Tim Cook announces the company is open to M&A on the AI front and preparing to announce more AI partnerships similar to its OpenAI integration for ChatGPT in Siri.
ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio models will become 'commoditized' over time while acknowledging they currently represent the biggest competitive advantage in the space.
